mapper.sql: id, create_date, update_date, data_status, desp, name, code, email, address, status, attachment_id_1,user_id
mapper.select:
select a.id, a.create_date, a.update_date, a.data_status, a.desp, a.name, a.code, a.email, a.address, a.status, a.user_id, a.attachment_id_1, b.attachment_link as attachment_id_1_link from t_company a left join t_attachment b on a.attachment_id_1 = b.id where 1= 1
and a.name like concat('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select a.id, a.create_date, a.update_date, a.data_status, a.desp, a.name, a.code, a.email, a.address, a.status, a.user_id, a.attachment_id_1, b.attachment_link as attachment_id_1_link from t_company a left join t_attachment b on a.attachment_id_1 = b.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into t_company (id, create_date, update_date, data_status, desp, name, code, email, address, status, attachment_id_1,user_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dataStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{desp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attachmentId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
